__doc_comment: All json code used from https://github.com/RIP95/kurisu-bot
__type_comment: type bot to sign is as bot or user to sign in as user
__credentials_comment: If user type selected input email/password
__token_comment: Provide token if you want to run bot on bot account.
__extensions_comment: Type in your plugins name here e.g. plugins.[Name]
__anilist_comment: sets the anilist id, is needed for character search or csearch
__prefix_comment: What you want the bot to be called
